data.name: Mariem Padron
data.profile: Hello there! I'm Mary, a Frontend Developer based in Bogota. CO. I Enjoy bulding webs, My goal is being an excellent developer :3

certificate.description: With HTML I learned the basics for any other type of language, from making headings, lists and forms to creating tables and attaching audiovisual content.
certificate.name: HTML5 from scratch to expert

certificate.description: CSS gave me the opportunity to make the structure I had learned to create aesthetically pleasing or eye-catching.
certificate.name: CSS3 from scratch to expert

academic.description: Psychology gave me an in-depth knowledge of human behavior, the processes that occur within the psyche, how to approach individuals and detect behaviors in clinical practice, as well as the reason and importance of certain psychological processes.
Having learned English opened other doors for me that I didn't even know existed before due to the language barrier, such as learning from people on the other side of the world.

experience.jobDescription: It's necessary to inform about prices, veterinary processes, scheduling appointments, sales, among other things.

The basis of this job is also to provide information on medical procedures, consultations, take blood pressure, height and weight, schedule appointments, deliver test results and communicate by phone with patients if necessary.

It is essential to communicate information about invoices, current status of telephone service, equipment prices, plans, services in the shortest possible time, making sure to give a positive experience during the interaction.
